name: SuspenseTime
0:
”Alexa, open suspense time”
”Alexa, ask suspense time for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start suspense time”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: suspense time
des:
Listen to the latest lectures and speaker series from your University. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill Suspense is a radio drama series broadcast on Radio from 1940 through 1962. One of the premier drama programs of the Golden Age of Radio, was subtitled "radio's outstanding theater of thrills" and focused on suspense thriller-type scripts, usually featuring leading Hollywood actors of the era.

(Public Domain)
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
